author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Social Justice conference organised by the Dravidar Kazhagam (DK) has urged the Central government to create a separate ministry for the development of Backward Classes. A resolution to this effect was adopted at the conference held here on Sunday presided over by the DK president K. Veeramani.

Although Backward Classes formed a majority of the population in the country, the funds allotted for their welfare was meagre.
title: Call for separate ministry for BCs
